title: School Annual Day Celebration
content: We are excited to announce our Annual Day celebration on March 15, 2024. All students and parents are invited to participate in this grand event.

title: Mid-Term Exams Schedule
content: Mid-term examinations will commence from February 26 and conclude by March 10, 2024. Check the exam schedule posted on the notice board for specific dates and timings.

title: Sports Day Registration Open
content: Registration for Sports Day is now open! Students interested in participating in various sports events can register through the PE department.
